timeline.message:
Ensures that translations are deleted when their owner is removed

Fixes: SIRI-228

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Ensures that if the owner entity is deleted, all of its translations are deleted as well
          
          
            
                 * Ensures that translations are cascaded-deleted upon deletion of the owner entity.

It could be moved, if only one of the options should be publicly available
